string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_edit_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be edited while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a print action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_print_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be printed while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on the reflow action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_reflow_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be viewed in reflow mode while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_search_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be searched while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a share action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_share_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be shared while it is being converted.

Delete all annotations in the document
Delete all bookmarks in the document
You can not delete all pages in the document.
There was a problem trying to create the file.
An error occurred trying to add the selected document.
An error occurred trying to create the document.
There was a problem with the selected file.
此操作將清除收藏夾的文件列表。
此操作將清除最近的文件列表。
此文件夾已存在。請輸入其他文件夾名。
創建文件夾中出錯。請稍後再試。
無效文件夾名。文件名中只能含有大小寫字母，數字，空格或下劃線符號。
Are you sure you want to delete the current page?
Do you want to <font color=#FF0000> delete</font> %1$d files and %2$d folders in \"%3$s\"? All files and subfolders will be deleted.
您確定要刪除這些文件嗎？

在 %1$s 選項卡，您的 SD 卡文檔都唯只讀，您將無法 %2$s 文檔。

請導航到 SD 卡的選項卡上，在那裏%3$s 具有讀寫存取SD 卡文檔權限。
在KitKat設備中，應用程式不再具有寫入外接SD 卡權限。%1$s
欲瞭解更多資訊，請查看此文: 外部 SD 卡是唯讀。
似乎您的設備不支援此功能。%1$s

文件名
%1$s

路徑
%2$s

大小
%3$s (%4$s Bytes)

修改時間
%5$s
此檔將以只讀模式打開。若要修改，請前往位於側導航欄的\"SD Card\"選項卡，在那裡 %1$s 具有寫入存取權限。%2$s。
打開位于側邊導航欄的\"SD卡\"選項卡，在那裏打開存在SD卡上的文件。%1$s。
Link to a page in this PDF
試圖合併文件時發生錯誤
%1$s 已存在。您要覆蓋原文件嗎？
在所有文件上重複此操作
此檔案受保護，請在下方輸入密碼。
您確定要移除\"%1$s\"的訪問權限嗎？這個文件夾並不會被刪除。
移除文件夾中出現錯誤。
您確定要移除這些文件夾的訪問權限嗎？這些文件夾並不會被刪除。
此文件名已被使用。請重新輸入文件名。
重命名中出現錯誤。請稍後再試。
無效文件名。請重新輸入文件名。
無效文件夾名。請重新輸入文件夾名。
In your web browser, open the ⋮ menu, select Share…, and choose Convert to PDF.
Open this document using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer to modify this document.
請先在設備上保存副本後，再修改此文檔。
此更改將不會被保存。請等待下載完成後再更改…
Document closed due to download cancellation.
Are you sure you wish to download this file (%1$s) using your mobile data connection?
複製文件中出錯。請稍後再試。
設備上的空間不足。請清理空間後再試。
已達到復製文件上限。請刪除不需要的文件後再試。
此PDF文檔已被損壞。很抱歉%1$s無法修復此文檔。
此PDF文檔已被損壞。很抱歉Xodo無法修復此文檔。
嘗試匯出文件時發生錯誤。
無法打開資料夾。請再試一次。
Portfolio documents cannot be added to this document.
The file contains proprietary XFA extensions and can\'t be opened.
Color has to be a hex value
There was a problem reading the text. Please try again.

The Read function is not working on your device. This is most likely due to your device\'s text-to-speech engine.

Please go to your Settings and switch to Google\'s Text-to-speech engine. For more info, please check out this article: Change to Google\'s text-to-speech engine.

resources.string: 此文件包含多個文檔。是否列出所有子文檔？

Change permissions in your device\'s settings.
Give %1$s access to Storage.
Storage permission is needed to proceed.
未被授予權限。請在設定中授予權限。
開啟後，點擊兩側邊緣可翻頁。
When enabled, the annotation list displays the annotation\'s author
請輸入您的默認姓名，以便他人識別您的註釋。
Are you sure you wish to restore the default color presets?
開啟後，編輯工具欄將保持在同一工具。
When enabled, the text of a highlight/underline/strikeout annotation is automatically copied into the annotation\'s note.
When enabled, top toolbar and side navigation drawer will be shown at all time.
When enabled, JavaScript actions embedded in PDF files will be executed.
正在從您的設備中載入字型…
List of available fonts for free text annotations.
開啟後，閱讀時將隱藏工具欄。
啟動後，掃描圖片文檔將被優化。
When enabled, ink drawn with a finger is smoothed. (Stylus ink is never smoothed.)
When enabled, the zoom level will not change when you turn pages horizontally.
開啟後，多個文檔將可同時打開。
開啟後，點擊左右兩側翻頁時將有動畫效果。
When enabled, the page number will be shown when turning pages.
開啟後，在最近的文件裡的文檔將在上次閱讀頁打開。
When enabled, the viewer\'s Page Display dialog includes an option to enable right-to-left document support.
開啟后，在閱讀文檔時屏幕將不會自動關閉。
When enabled, the annotation will be selected after it is created with the toolbar.
When enabled, the stylus will create (and edit) annotations, and a finger will scroll and zoom the viewer.
使用觸碰筆當作手繪筆
Markup is not available in reflow mode.
Search is not available in reflow mode.
此文件夾中的文件均為只讀
Document has been saved and closed.
Your device\'s volume is on mute.

string.comment: When filtering files, if there are no files of the selected types, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_files_of_selected_type

resources.string: 沒有選定檔案類型的文檔。

string.comment: When filtering files, if no files match the string, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_string_match

resources.string: 沒有文檔匹配文本篩選器。
Xodo: 由 PDFTron 製作 (๑•̀ㅂ•́) و✧
沒有選中的二級存儲文件夾。\n點擊 + 來選擇文件夾。
要收藏文檔，請使用 %1$s 的文件瀏覽器來查找文檔，然後點擊文檔信息
按鈕。然後點擊收藏符號
您確定要恢復默認顏色嗎？此操作無法撤銷。
已複製的注釋至剪貼簿
Press Ctrl+V to paste where the cursor is
從注釋複製至剪貼簿, 複製中, 請稍待…
添加作者姓名到註釋。可在設置中更改。
Flattening the annotation will make it a permanent part of the PDF, so that it cannot be modified or removed by standard viewing software. This can be undone.
此操作將刪除原有簽名。是否要繼續？
是否要保存新簽名並覆蓋原有的簽名？
使用外觀失敗；簽名失敗。
使用外觀失敗（無效圖片鏈接）；簽名失敗。
已簽名。以下是關於簽名的信息：
保存失敗： 文件已被鎖定
下面的空白可用於簽名，或者點擊\"選擇圖片…\" 來使用圖片作為簽名。
點擊“簽名並保存”之後， 文件將使用已存在的證書和密碼進行簽名，並保存。如果只需要添加簽名樣式，之後再使用證書籤名， 點擊\"使用外觀\"。點擊使用外觀之後可以在以後更改外觀的顏色和粗細。
從剪貼簿貼至注釋中, 請稍待…
The colors you recently used will appear here
播放嵌入媒體時發生錯誤
第 %1$d 頁 共 %2$d 頁
This crop box will be used for all pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
This crop box will be used for even pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
This crop box will be used for odd pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
Automatically crop each page to its content, manually crop pages, or remove all page cropping.
